accounts.name: profile
docs: PlayerProfile PDA - must belong to `player`

accounts.name: authority
docs: The program admin (must match `config.authority`)

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority must match `config.authority`

accounts.name: config
docs: Global config (authority, tiers, fee_bps, etc.)

accounts.name: live_feed
docs: Live feed for this tier (must match epoch & tier)

accounts.name: resolved_game
docs: ResolvedGame PDA for this epoch & tier – must already exist

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority allowed to kick off resolution for this program

accounts.name: game
docs: Resolved game account containing Merkle root and claim tracking.

accounts.name: prediction
docs: Prediction associated with the claiming wallet for this game chain.

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Treasury holding lamports for all payouts.

accounts.name: claimer
docs: Wallet receiving the payout.

accounts.name: config
docs: Global config (for authority + fee_bps etc.)

accounts.name: live_feed
docs: Live feed for this tier (must match epoch & tier)

accounts.name: resolved_game
docs: ResolvedGame PDA for this epoch & tier – MUST already exist

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Treasury holding the SOL for all games

accounts.name: fee_vault
docs: Fee vault where protocol fees are accumulated

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority account that is allowed to resolve games

accounts.name: config
docs: Global Config PDA.
Only the `authority` stored in Config is allowed to update it.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Current program authority.
Must match `config.authority` due to the `has_one` constraint above.

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Pass treasury for the live feed.

accounts.name: config
docs: Global config PDA.

accounts.name: live_feed
docs: Live feed PDA for the provided tier.

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Treasury PDA holding protocol lamports.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Only admin program authority that is allowed to reset tiers.

accounts.name: config
docs: Global Config PDA.
Only the `authority` stored in Config is allowed to update it.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Current program authority.
Must match `config.authority` due to the `has_one` constraint above.

accounts.name: config
docs: Global config (stores tiers, authority, etc.)

accounts.name: authority
docs: Program authority (admin / DAO / multisig)

types.name: Config
docs: Global configuration PDA.
Stores protocol-wide controls (authority, fee routing, pause flags),
fee parameters, and tier settings. This account holds no lamports.

fields.name: pause_bet
docs: 1 = betting paused, 0 = enabled.

fields.name: pause_withdraw
docs: 1 = withdrawals/claims paused, 0 = enabled.

fields.name: authority
docs: Program admin authority.

fields.name: fee_vault
docs: Destination for collected protocol fees.

fields.name: base_fee_bps
docs: Base protocol fee in basis points (1 bps = 0.01%).

fields.name: bet_cutoff_slots
docs: Minimum slots remaining in the epoch required to allow betting.

fields.name: started_at
docs: Unix timestamp when protocol was initialized.

fields.name: started_epoch
docs: Solana epoch when protocol was initialized.

fields.name: primary_roll_over_number
docs: Primary number that triggers rollover behavior.

fields.name: tiers
docs: Tier configurations (fixed-size array).

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump for Config.

fields.name: min_fee_bps
docs: Minimum allowed fee in basis points.

fields.name: rollover_fee_step_bps
docs: Fee step applied to rollover scenarios (basis points).

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved space for future upgrades.

fields.name: epoch
docs: The current Solana epoch being tracked for this tier.

fields.name: first_epoch_in_chain
docs: First epoch included in the current epoch-chain for this tier.

fields.name: total_lamports
docs: Total lamports wagered across the current epoch-chain.

fields.name: carried_over_lamports
docs: Lamports carried into the current epoch (accounting only).

fields.name: total_bets
docs: Total bet count across the current epoch-chain.

fields.name: carried_over_bets
docs: Bet count carried into the current epoch (accounting only).

fields.name: bet_cutoff_slots
docs: Slots-before-epoch-end cutoff enforced for betting.

fields.name: tier
docs: Tier ID for this feed (1..=5).

fields.name: treasury
docs: Treasury PDA holding lamports for payouts/fees.

fields.name: epochs_carried_over
docs: Number of times this game carried forward due to rollover.

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump.

fields.name: lamports_per_number
docs: Lamports wagered per number index (0..=9).

fields.name: bets_per_number
docs: Bet count per number index (0..=9).

fields.name: secondary_rollover_number
docs: Secondary rollover number for this tier’s current game (0 disables).

fields.name: current_fee_bps
docs: Current fee rate for this tier’s current game.

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved for future fields.

fields.name: player
docs: The owner/player wallet

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

fields.name: tickets_available
docs: Number of available re-roll tickets

fields.name: recent_bets
docs: Circular buffer of the last N bet pubkeys

fields.name: recent_bets_len
docs: Number of valid entries currently stored (0~RECENT_BETS_CAP)

fields.name: recent_bets_head
docs: Next index to write (wraps around 0..RECENT_BETS_CAP-1)

fields.name: locked_until_epoch
docs: Prevent closer if player is in game.

fields.name: first_played_epoch
docs: first game played

types.name: Prediction
docs: Prediction
Represents a user's prediction for a specific Solana epoch.
Supports multiple "selection styles" while keeping the account fixed-size.

fields.name: game_epoch
docs: First epoch in the chain for this game (stable game ID).

fields.name: epoch
docs: Epoch in which this prediction was placed (maybe > game_epoch for rollovers).

fields.name: player
docs: Player wallet.

fields.name: tier
docs: Tier this prediction is for.

fields.name: prediction_type
docs: Prediction type (UI/analytics hint; the selection set is the source of truth).
0 = single_number
1 = split (any number of numbers)
2 = high_low
3 = even_odd

fields.name: selection_count
docs: How many entries in `selections` are active (1..=8).
- single_number: 1
- two_numbers: 2
- high_low: typically 4 (exact set stored)
- even_odd: typically 3..=5 depending on blocked rollover numbers
- future "cover" styles: up to 8

fields.name: selections_mask
docs: Bitmask of selected numbers (bit n => number n is selected).

fields.name: selections
docs: Selections used by the prediction (exact covered numbers).
The active set is `selections[0..selection_count]`.
Each entry must be in 1..=9 and must not include blocked rollover numbers
(e.g., 0 and last winning number).
Examples:
- single_number: [7, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0] (selection_count=1)
- two_numbers:   [2, 7, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0] (selection_count=2)
- high_low:      [1, 2, 3, 4, 0, 0, 0, 0] (selection_count=4)
- even_odd:      [1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 0, 0, 0] (selection_count=5)

fields.name: lamports
docs: Total lamports wagered for this prediction.
Invariant: lamports == lamports_per_number * selection_count

fields.name: changed_count
docs: The number of times this prediction has been changed.

fields.name: placed_slot
docs: Slot at which the prediction was first placed.

fields.name: placed_at_ts
docs: Timestamp when the prediction was first placed.

fields.name: last_updated_at_ts
docs: Timestamp when the prediction was last updated.

fields.name: has_claimed
docs: Whether the prediction has been claimed.

fields.name: claimed_at_ts
docs: Timestamp when the prediction was claimed (0 if unclaimed, or leave as-is).

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump.

fields.name: version
docs: Version marker for decoding & future migrations.

fields.name: lamports_per_number
docs: Lamports wagered per selected number.

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved for future use.

types.name: ResolvedGame
docs: ResolvedGame
Finalized record of a single IC42N game, created after a Solana epoch ends.
Stores immutable results, Merkle root, winners, and carry-over data.
This account is created **after an epoch ends**, once results are known
and the Merkle tree of winners has been computed.
This struct acts as the **ledger entry** for that epoch and tier:
- records total bets and pot size
- tracks carry-over amounts
- stores the Merkle root for claim verification
- exposes an immutable URI with full result data
⚠️ Lamports themselves are **never held here** — they remain in the
central Treasury PDA. This account is purely an accounting and claims record.

fields.name: curve_factor
docs: Optional shaping factor used by your payout/odds math.

fields.name: ticket_reward_bps
docs: Ticket distribution rate in basis points of losers (0 disables).

fields.name: ticket_reward_max
docs: Max number of recipients eligible for tickets per resolved game.

fields.name: tickets_per_recipient
docs: Number of tickets to award per selected recipient.

types.name: TierUpdateArgs
docs: Arguments for updating one or more fields of a given tier.
All fields are optional:
- If a field is `None`, the existing value is left unchanged.
- `tier_id` is used to locate the tier inside `Config.tiers`.

fields.name: tier_id
docs: Numeric ID of the tier to update (must match an existing TierSettings.tier_id).

fields.name: active
docs: If provided, sets the active flag (0 or 1).

fields.name: min_bet_lamports
docs: New minimum bet in lamports (optional).

fields.name: max_bet_lamports
docs: New maximum bet in lamports (optional).

fields.name: curve_factor
docs: New curve multiplier for this tier (optional).

fields.name: ticket_reward_bps
docs: Ticket reward % (in basis points) for this tier (optional).
1000 = 10% of losers. 0 disables ticket awards.

fields.name: ticket_reward_max
docs: Hard cap on ticket recipients for this tier (optional).

fields.name: tickets_rewarded
docs: Ticket reward count for this tier (optional).

types.name: Treasury
docs: Treasury
Program-owned PDA that holds SOL for the IC42N game.
If you use a single global treasury, `tier` is fixed to 0.

fields.name: authority
docs: Who controls configuration / fee withdrawals.

fields.name: tier
docs: Tier this treasury is associated with:
0 = Global (all tiers)
1 = Low, 2 = Mid, 3 = High (if you ever decide to split).

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump for deterministic re-derivation.

fields.name: total_in_lamports
docs: Total lamports ever received as bets into this treasury
(monotonic counter, for analytics / audit).

fields.name: total_out_lamports
docs: Total lamports ever paid out to winners from this treasury.

fields.name: total_fees_withdrawn
docs: Total lamports withdrawn as protocol fees (house edge).

fields.name: version
docs: Versioning for future migrations.

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Padding / reserved bytes for future use (config, extra flags).
